text: Marc Bischofberger (born 26 January 1991) is a Swiss freestyle skier competing in ski cross discipline. ==Career== He finished 16th at the 2015 World Championships and 10th at the 2017 World Championships. He then won the silver medal at the 2018 Olympic Games. He made his World Cup debut in March 2013 in Åre. He recorded his first top-10 in December 2013, when finishing seventh in Innichen, and won his first World Cup event in January 2015 in Val Thorens. ==References== Category:1991 births Category:Swiss male freestyle skiers Category:Olympic freestyle skiers of Switzerland Category:Freestyle skiers at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Living people Category:Olympic silver medalists for Switzerland Category:Medalists at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Olympic medalists in freestyle skiing
title: Marc Bischofberger
